channel.description: [center][img]http://oi42.tinypic.com/303h7iw.jpg[/img] Webclient: [url=http://perfectionxrsps.enjin.com/webclient]http://perfectionxrsps.enjin.com/webclient[/url] Forum: [url=http://perfectionxrsps.enjin.com/home]http://perfectionxrsps.enjin.com/home[/url] [size=14pt][b]-Features-[/b][/size] [font=V0rdana][size=13pt]INSTANT SPAWN/PK[/size][/font] Amazing combat system Player Attack & Follow clipping Most Exploits fixed PVM Cheat Client Patched New hp bars/fading/x10 toggle Clan chats 100% Mage bank + Near by areas features coded. 100% Switching Pk Points exchange system Vote point shop & Pk Point shop All Pking spots in mage book teleport. quest tab pk information. Titles Correct food & Pot delay PKP FunPK - Soon to be added Everything needed for a pk server. [size=14pt][b]Videos of server - I'm sorry if any upset you, they were created by a player![/b][/size] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wzMhnWenPaQ[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H4KrM_RhRhQ[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fCW2peLyn8c&feature=c4-overview&list=UUH2MtNqw1sUbBoA1JKgRGww[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A5HkiHvqu4M[/youtube] Amazing features added to pking to make the experience funner [img]http://chaoticrealm.net/images/switching.gif[/img] [img]http://chaoticrealm.net/images/curses.png[/img] [img]http://chaoticrealm.net/images/autocast.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/rsezbn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2h6ay2r.png[/img]
